shortdesc.ph: Starts client-side audio recording and sets the recording sample rate.

p.codeblock: virtual int startAudioRecording(const char* filePath, AUDIO_RECORDING_QUALITY_TYPE quality) = 0;
public abstract int startAudioRecording(String filePath, int quality);

section.p:
After calling this method, you can record the audio of all users in the channel during a call and generate a recording file that contains all voices. The recording file supports the following formats only:
.wav: Large file size, high audio fidelity.
.aac: Small file size, lower audio fidelity.

You must call this method after calling joinChannel. The recording automatically stops when leaveChannel is called.
Make sure the specified directory exists and is writable.

ul.li: Make sure the specified path exists and is writable.
You must call this method after calling joinChannel. If leaveChannel is called during recording, the recording stops automatically.

section.note: When calling this method, the default recording sample rate is 32 kHz and cannot be changed.

The absolute path of the recording file to be saved locally, including the file name and extension. For example: . Make sure the specified path exists and is writable.

Recording quality:
0: Low quality. Sample rate is 32 kHz, about 1.2 MB for 10 minutes.
1: Medium quality. Sample rate is 32 kHz, about 2 MB for 10 minutes.
2: High quality. Sample rate is 32 kHz, about 3.75 MB for 10 minutes.
